title: I'll Be a Son of a Ghostbuster
description: Prime Evil attempts to capture Tracy, but ends up with Eddie instead.

title: Frights of the Roundtable
description: The Ghostbusters travel to the future and learn of an ancient stone tablet that has clues to their fathers' whereabouts.

title: No Pharoah at All
description: The Ghostbusters team up with wizard Fuddy to defeat Sir Trance-A-Lot and recover the next piece of the stone then travel to ancient Egypt.

title: The Secret of Mastodon Valley
description: After defeating Apparitia and Airhead the Ghostbusters head back to prehistoric times, looking for another piece of the stone.

title: The Ones Who Saved the Future
description: Jake and Eddie find their fathers and come into their own as Ghostbusters when they dispatch Prime Evil and his horde.

title: Witch's Stew
description: The Ghostbusters travel back in time to the 1600s to rescue Futura from Prime Evil at the Salem witch trials.

title: Mummy Dearest
description: Prime Evil uses the Mummy "Air Head" to scare oil workers in order to dry up all the worlds fuel supply

title: Wacky Wax Museum
description: Spencer Kong and Tracey have had wax statues made of them. Prime Evil is jealous and sends Haunter and Mystique to destroy the statues. When they fail the Tooth Hairies attempt to blackmail the french Waxworks owner to create a statue of Prime Evil for the waxworks hall of Villans or they'll eat the Eiffel Tower.

title: Statue of Liberty
description: Jakes Grandfather is going to swear allegiance to the USA at a ceremony in front of the statue of liberty. However Mystique is sent by Prime Evil to spoil the ceremony.

title: The Ransom of Eddie Spenser
description: Prime Evil has created an army of thunder ghosts, these ghost make it rain all over the world. In order to stop the Ghostbusters from stopping them, he orders Haunter to kidnap the Ghostbusters, and sends Fangster to help him. When the 2 ghouls bungle the job and Fangster is sent back to the nether-realm, Haunter grabs Eddie and runs. Jake and Tracey are up to their necks trying to get rid of all the thunder ghosts. Prime Evil intends to ransom Eddie back. However, Eddie keeps breaking out of the dungeon and his clumsiness causes Prime Evil no end of headaches and drives him mad.

title: Eddie Takes Charge
description: Eddie singlehandedly tries to de-haunt a western ghost town.

title: The Great Ghost Gorilla
description: The Great Ghost Gorilla kidnaps Tracy to use him as the model for an army of super robot gorillas.

title: A Friend in Need
description: A powerful Spectre Sceptre enables Big Evil to imprison Prime Evil and take over Hauntquarters.

title: No Mo' Snow
description: Prime Evil creates a dragon to melt the polar ice caps and flood the world.

title: Prime Evil's Good Deed
description: Prime Evil turns to the Ghostbusters when he is cursed with a spell that can only be broken by performing a good deed.

title: Cyman's Revenge
description: The Ghostbusters journey to the distant future to stop Cyman from destroying Futura's spaceship.

title: The Headless Horseman Caper
description: When the Headless Horseman of Sleepy Hollow comes to the Ghostbuster's office, Jake gives the spirit a chance to redeem himself.

title: Banish That Banshee
description: When Prime Evil unleashes a wailing banshee, the Ghostbusters search for a leprechaun to combat it.

title: Rollerghoster
description: The Ghostbusters save an amusement park after prime Evil sends Apparitia to haunt it.

title: He Went Brataway
description: When Prime Evil leaves, Bratarat takes over Hauntquarters and tries to conquer London.

title: The Looking-Glass Warrior
description: The Ghostbusters join forces with Jessica's uncle to defeat invertroids from another dimension.

title: Laser and Future Rock
description: Futura's nephew and his rock band are captured by a slug-like energy called Corpulon.

title: Runaway Choo Choo
description: The Ghostbusters travel to Sweden to rescue Jessica from a sneak ghost attack and end up on a runaway train.

title: Dynamite Dinosaurs
description: Prime Evil brings back dinosaurs from the past to terrorize Earth.

title: Ghostbunglers
description: The Ghostbusters travel to Ancient Rome to prevent Prime Evil from capturing Caesar's magical wreath.

title: My Present to the Future
description: The Ghostbusters investigate why Prime Evil has been haunting a young boy's telescope.

title: The Beastly Buggy
description: It's the Ghost Buggy versus Prime Evil's Beastly Buggy in a race around the world.

title: Belfry Leads the Way
description: The Ghostbusters travel to the North Pole to stop prime Evil from taking over the world's underground layer.

title: The Battle for Ghost Command
description: Toxic waste in the sewers causes the entire town to go crazy.

title: Going Ape
description: Count Grumpette creates an evil double of Tracy in order to frame the Ghostbusters.

title: The Haunting of Gizmo
description: A futuristic ghost invades the Star Base Crusader's master computer and the Ghostbusters shrink down for a closer look.

title: Ghostnappers
description: The Ghostbusters rescue Madam Why and her crystal ball from Prime Evil's dungeons.

title: Inside Out
description: The Ghostbusters journey to the center of the Earth.

title: The Sleeping Dragon
description: Jessica, Futura and the Ghostbusters travel to China to find out why a Sleeping Dragon is turning people to stone.

title: The Phantom of the Big Apple
description: Jessica is captured by New York City's Phantom of the Big Apple.

title: Shades of Dracula
description: Dracula returns to Transylvania, and it's up to the Ghostbusters to stop him.

title: Outlaw In-Laws
description: Prime Evil attempts to amplify Belfry's blast in order to destroy the world.

title: Our Buddy Fuddy
description: The Ghostbusters must rescue Fuddy when he's mistaken for Merlin and taken to Hauntquarters.

title: Train to Doom-De-Doom-Doom
description: It's up to the Ghostbusters to prevent Haunter from stealing the Royal Crown of Patronia and becoming king.

title: The Princess and the Troll
description: The Ghostbusters go to fairytale land to rescue a princess from a Troll.

title: Second Chance
description: The Tooth Scaries are persuaded by Prime Evil to steal the legendary Diamond of the Nile.

title: Tracy Come Back
description: Tracy is captured by Prime Evil and placed in a machine that replaces his memories with ones in which Prime Evil is the champion.

title: Doggone Werewolf
description: Fangster captures Corky's new dog as part of a plot to turn all dogs into an army of werewolf slaves.

title: That's No Alien
description: Prime Evil and his gang pose as aliens visiting Earth in the future.

title: Scareplane
description: The Ghostbusters intervene when Prime Evil attempts to hijack a space ship.

title: The Ghost of Don Quixote
description: The ghost of Don Quixote arrives to protect a Spanish farmer and his family from an unscrupulous mine owner.

title: The White Whale
description: The evil ghost, Harpoon, kidnaps the ghost of Moby Dick in order to capture spaceliners.

title: Whither Why
description: The Ghostbusters and bats Rafter, Eaves, and Beauregard, come to the rescue when Madame Why is captured by the evil Wormroot.

title: Knight of Terror
description: Prime Evil kidnaps a young computer genius to help him take over the computers that control nuclear missiles.

title: The Girl Who Cried Vampire
description: The Ghostbusters travel to a moon colony in the future to install anti-ghost security devices.

title: Little Big Bat
description: Prime Evil tricks Belfry into shrinking the Ghostbusters.

title: Really Roughing It
description: The Ghostbusters' wilderness vacation turns into a hunt for a magical Sleeping Goblin.

title: The Bad Old Days
description: Prime Evil sends the world back to the time of Ancient Babylon as part of a plot to take over.

title: The Curse of the Diamond of Gloom
description: The Ghostbusters must replace the Diamond of Gloom by the full moon or the Earth will be forever cursed.

title: The Bind That Ties
description: Eddie finds himself chained to a large voodoo monster that the Ghostbusters have been hired to capture.

title: Like Father, Like Son
description: Jake and his family are being turned into werewolves.

title: The Fourth Ghostbuster
description: Corky boasts to his friend Tony that he's a Ghostbuster.

title: Country Cousin
description: Belfry's country cousin Beauregard visits the Ghost Command and helps defeat Mr. Squid.

title: A Cold Winter's Night
description: Prime Evil creates an enormous volcano to push the Earth out of orbit.

title: Father Knows Beast
description: A Scottish boy accidentally releases the spirit of Slort, King of the Trolls.

title: Back to the Past
description: Prime Evil turns the Ghostbusters into five-year-olds to discourage them from becoming adult Ghostbusters.

title: Pretend Friends
description: Prime Evil sends his crew to halt progress on a super submarine.

title: The Haunted Painting
description: Prime Evil uses magic to lure the Ghostbusters into the topsy-turvy world of an eerie landscape painting.

title: Maze Caves
description: Eddie and Tracy go in search of a buried treasure and wind up lost in the dark tunnels of Planet Doom.

title: The Way You Are
description: When Jake and Tracy are zapped by Count Freeze, the Wizard of Castle Blackstone offers Eddie a chance to become a super hero.
